jobDescription: I worked as a supporting teacher at the Compiler Science Area. I managed to learn the basics of compilers and its implementation
During the last 6 months I gave support to existing and new software for the company, adding and reviewing functionalities, as well as working in new solutions
Currently I am working part-time as a freelancer at several projects. I work with technologies such as NodeJs, AngularJs, .Net C#, Angular 8 and more.
